DOC.brief_summary: Despite fact 10 % Americans suffer migraine , headache disorder often diagnose appropriately treat . The goal proposal determine whether migraine protocol design use emergency room use deliver headache care many migraine patient never receive . This randomized trial . Consecutive inadequately treat migraine patient randomize TYPICAL care COMPREHENSIVE care . Those patient comprehensive care arm receive follow intervention : 1 ) reinforcement diagnosis , 2 ) adaptable online educational intervention , read material , headache diary , 3 ) two migraine specific medication 4 ) expedite referral headache specialist , need . Patients typical care arm receive whatever intervention emergency physician feel appropriate . We intend enroll 21 patient arm study total 42 patient . Using headache survey , determine protocol improve migraine-related pain functional disability one month ER visit .
